author: Staff Reporter
text:
Police on Tuesday arrested Hanifa (49), South Chennai district secretary of Manithaneya Makkal Katchi (MMK) in connection with the attack on his party’s office in Pudupet in January.

The MMK office was ransacked and cash kept in the office was also stolen. “Based on the CCTV footage, we arrested four men including Hanifa,” police said.
title: MMK functionary held for attack on party office
